snippet: Secure Communities, a controversial Immigration and Customs Enforcement program to identify illegal immigrants, will expand across Massachusetts and New York next week.
abstract: Obama administration officials announce that Secure Communities, controversial Immigration and Customs Enforcement fingerprinting program that identifies illegal immigrants, will be extended across Massachusetts and New York.
lead_paragraph: Secure Communities, a controversial Immigration and Customs Enforcement program to identify illegal immigrants, will expand across Massachusetts and New York next week.

headline.seo: ICE to Expand Secure Communities Program in Mass. and N.Y.
headline.main: Despite Opposition, Immigration Agency to Expand Fingerprint Program
headline.print_headline: Despite Opposition, Immigration Agency to Expand Fingerprint Program
